amendatorysection.catchline: Medical assistance; state accepts federal provisions.
amendatorysection.para: For purposes of paying medical assistance under the Medical Assistance Act and sections 68-1002 and 68-1006, the State of Nebraska accepts and assents to all applicable provisions of Title XIX and Title XXI of the federal Social Security Act. Any reference in the Medical Assistance Act to the federal Social Security Act or other acts or sections of federal law shall be to such federal acts or sections as they existed on January 1, 2010.

annotation.para: This section requires the director of the Department of Health and Human Services Finance and Support to promulgate rules and policies implementing the Nebraska Medicaid program. Boruch v. Nebraska Dept. of Health and Human Servs., 11 Neb. App. 713, 659 N.W.2d 848 (2003).
